remarks:
Ordering property of addition on reals.  Axiom 20 of 22 for real and complex numbers, derived from ZF set theory.  (This restates ~ ax-pre-ltadd with ordering on the extended reals.)  (Contributed by NM, 13-Oct-2005.) 

---

 Ordering property of addition on reals.  Axiom for real and complex numbers, derived from set theory.  (This restates ~ ax-pre-ltadd with ordering on the extended reals.)  (Contributed by NM, 13-Oct-2005.)
statement: axltadd $p |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR /\ C e. RR ) -> ( A < B -> ( C + A ) < ( C + B ) ) ) $.
